column6: We would love for you to come and enjoy our vacation beach home. The house is a short 5-10 minute walk to the beach! We have 3 bedrooms with a king, queen, and 2 sets of twin bunk beds. \n\nWe have everything you need to make wonderful vacation memories. There are 3 decks and a large ground-level covered patio to relax on. The outdoor areas are furnished with a picnic bench and patio furniture. The kitchen is fully equipped, and linens, cable TV, and WiFi Internet access are provided.
